casebody.data:
Friday, December 15, 2000

MOTION DOCKET

00-1833. State v. Jordan.

Lucas C.P. No. CR982736. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Lucas County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time to transmit the record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time to transmit the record be, and hereby is, granted, and the time for transmitting the record is extended to February 12, 2001.
